title.narrative: Advocacy for social inclusion of persons with deaf disabilities

description.narrative: Project aims at diminishing the phenomenon of discrimination deepening human rights andenhancing social inclusion of persons with hearing disabilities in Moldova.In order to achieve the objective the following activities will be implemented:-Manual Progres sive Methods of Learning the Sign Language for Persons with Hearing Impairments will be developed and published,-Digital platform Surdoserver.MD will be developed,-112 Emergency Service concept for persons with hearing impairments will be promoted,-Car tou r Persons with Hearing Disabilities Do Exist and They Are Part of Our Society with the submission of petitions will be conducted,-Advocacy campaign Persons with Hearing Disabilities Do Exist and They Are Part of Our Society with the submission of petitions to authorities will be carried out.
